Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.name: onText(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to receive text-formatted messages.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.name: onData(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to receive binary-formatted messages.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.name: onClose(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket that will be called when the connection closes.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.name: onError(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to handle errors.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.name: send(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.abstract: Sends text-formatted data to the connected client.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.name: send(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.abstract: Sends text-formatted data to the connected client.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.name: send(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.abstract: Sends binary-formatted data to the connected client.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC2.name: httpProtocolUpgrader(shouldUpgrade:onUpgrade:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC2.abstract: Creates an HTTPProtocolUpgrader that will create instances of this class upon HTTP upgrade.

Classes/WebSocket.html.name: WebSocket
Classes/WebSocket.html.abstract: Represents a client connected via WebSocket protocol.
